# freelog-base

egg-freelog-api基础框架

## QuickStart

```bash
$ npm install egg-freelog-base
```

```js
// {app_root}/config/plugin.js
module.exports = {
    freelogBase: {
        enable: true,
        package: "egg-freelog-base",
    }
}
```

## Questions & Suggestions

Please send email to yu.liang@freelog.com
